text: I cannot imagine any writer who would not fight for his peace and quiet.
author: Wislawa Szymborska

text: Vegetarianism is a link to perfection and peace.
author: River Phoenix

text: I am President of the UN created University for Peace, which has a strong commitment to the relationship between peace, security and the environment. I meet with young people around the world and I always come away enthused and encouraged.
author: Maurice Strong

text: One little person, giving all of her time to peace, makes news. Many people, giving some of their time, can make history.
author: Peace Pilgrim

text: And I have lived since - as you have - in a period of cold war, during which we have ensured by our achievements in the science and technology of destruction that a third act in this tragedy of war will result in the peace of extinction.
author: Lester B. Pearson
